page.title: 16A BUSY LIFE ON THE FARM
page.content: MY BEST FRIEND HUGH MORRISON LIVES ON A FARM.THE FARM IS NEAR THE AMESBURY ROUNDABOUT. THE MAIN ANIMAL IS SHEEP. AT THE MOMENT THEY HAVE ABOUT 500 SHEEP AND 1000 LAMBS.THE MAIN TIME OF THE YEAR IS LAMBING,AT THIS TIME OF THE YEAR MORE PEOPLE COME TO HELP.A SHEEP USUALLY HAS TWO LAMBS. DURING THE YEAR THEY ALSO SHEAR THE SHEEP 2-3 TIMES.IN THE SUMMER THEY DIP THE SHEEP TO PREVENT MAGGOTS. LAST YEAR MR.MORRISON BOUGHT A NEW CIRCULAR DIP WHICH MAKES THE JOB EASIER. THEY ALSO PRODUCE GRAIN SUCH AS WHEAT, BARLEY, MAIZE AND OIL- SEED RAPE. IN THE LATE SUMMER EVERYONE GOES INTO THE FIELDS TO PICK THE WILD OATS, THIS IS A LONG AND BORING JOB, BUT IT MUST BE DONE. WHEN THE CORN IS RIPE THEY GO ROUND WITH A COMBINE HARVESTER COLLECTING ALL THE GRAIN.
